REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1779 reute d f BC-AMSOUTH-BANCORP-<ASO> 04-13 0095

TEXT.TITLE: AMSOUTH BANCORP <ASO> SETS EXCHANGE RATIO
TEXT.BODY: AmSouth Bancorp said it will issue about 3,166,000 shares of stock to acquire First Tuskaloosa Corp. Under a previously announced merger agreement, Amsouth offered 66 dlrs a share in Amsouth stock for First Tuskaloosa. The company said First Tuskaloosa shareholders will receive 1.978825 shares of Amsouth stock for each First Tuskaloosa share held when the merger is effected April 17. First Tuskaloosa has assets of more than 425 mln dlrs. Amsouth's assets are about six billion dlrs. Reuter
